sentences.sContent: If it’s any consolation, things do get easier as the child gets older.
sentences.sCn: 聊可安慰的是，随着这孩子慢慢长大，境况也好起来了。

sentences.sContent: He had the consolation of knowing that he couldn’t have done any better.
sentences.sCn: 他知道自己已经尽了最大努力，心中便有了安慰。

synos.tran: 安慰；慰问；起安慰作用的人或事物

remMethod.val: con(=with以) + sol(安慰) + ation → 可用来给人安慰的东西 → 安慰； 慰问

words.tran: [计] 控制台；[电] 操纵台

trans.tranOther: something that makes you feel better when you are sad or disappointed
